# Read-To-Me Podcast

Verbatim reading of Twitter bookmarks. Immediate delivery when bookmarked.

## Feed URL
https://gaudonio.github.io/podcast-readtome/feed.xml

## Format
- Single narrator (OpenAI TTS - Alloy voice)
- Verbatim reading of tweet content
- Minimal intro/outro
